alert.note: Alert for Independence; Izard; Jackson; Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 1:38PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Independence, south central Randolph, southeastern Izard, northeastern Jackson, Lawrence and southern Sharp Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moorefield, or near Batesville, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Batesville... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Cave City... Newark... Swifton... Imboden... Ravenden... Cushman... Portia... Mount Pleasant... Strawberry... Lynn... Magness... Sidney... Moorefield... Alicia... Ravenden Springs... This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 109 and 120. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas.
